info.title: Manage NGINX Instances
info.description: Manage your NGINX dataplane instances, view security advisories (CVEs), and analyze the NGINX configuration for issues and recommendations.

get.summary: Displays a summary of instance-related information for the tenant.
get.description:
Retrieve a summary of all instances, including:
  * Certificates and associations
  * Operating system
  * NGINX Agent version
  * System status

Retrieves detailed information for all NGINX instances, including:
  * Unique identifiers
  * Timestamps of key actions (registration, last reported, etc.)
  * NGINX build data
  * Agent version

get.summary: Lists security advisories for a specific NGINX instance.
get.description: Shows security advisories (CVEs) for a specific NGINX instance, identified by its UUID.

404.description: Instance or security advisories not found for the specified UUID.

get.summary: Retrieve a specific NGINX instance's details.
get.description:
Fetches detailed information for a specific NGINX instance, identified by its UUID. 
The response includes important information, such as:
* NGINX Agent version
* Instance hostname
* System status
* Timestamps of key actions (registration, last reported, etc.)
* NGINX build information
* Certificate data
* Operating system version

delete.description:
Deletes a specific NGINX instance, identified by its UUID. This will clean up
all certificate associations for this instance.

get.summary: Get an NGINX configuration analysis report for a specific NGINX instance.
get.description:
Generates a detailed analysis report of the NGINX configuration for a specific NGINX instance, identified by its UUID.
The report includes insights, identified issues, and recommendations for optimizing and troubleshooting.

200.description: NGINX configuration analysis report retrieved successfully.

404.description: Instance or NGINX configuration analysis report not found for the specified UUID.

get.summary: Retrieve the configuration details for a specific NGINX instance.
get.description:
Fetches configuration information for a specific NGINX instance, identified by its UUID. 
The response includes important information, such as:
* Main configuration path
* Details about configuration files
* Details about auxiliary files
* Unique identifiers

404.description: Instance or configuration details not found for the specified UUID.
